title: The WTA and Women’s Tennis Struggle With Challenges
description: Money problems, shifting venues and a costly dispute with China have left the tour looking for answers — and a financial lifeline.
dc:creator: Cindy Shmerler
media:description: Iga Swiatek, above, has proved to be a willing successor to Ashleigh Barty. She is now heading into the WTA Finals with eight titles on the season.
